name: Distort 'N Alter (MadFox)
description:
Game Description

Distort ‘N Alter is 2D Top Down game taking place in 2100. Gather transformations with the power of Distort and change your environment with the Alter. Survive to the scientist trials and uncover the truth behind those experiments...

Created by :

Kevin Ibanez -  Game Designer, Lead Programer

Michel Canet - Game/Level Designer

Jérémy Real - Game/Level Designer, Narrative Designer

Arthur Manoux - Game Designer, Programer

Luc Chavansot - Game Designer, 2D Artist, UI Designer, Narrative Designer

Michael Jouchoux - Game/Level Designer
